actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution relating to funding of the Select Committee to Study Law Enforcement Undercover Activities of Components of the Department of Justice.

summary.text: Authorizes the Select Committee to Study Law Enforcement Undercover Activities of Components of the Department of Justice to make expenditures until January 15, 1983.

titles.title: A resolution relating to funding of the Select Committee to Study Law Enforcement Undercover Activities of Components of the Department of Justice.
